participant_1.background:
I spend my spare time watching TV and working on my gaming startup.
i got a scholarship for playing soccer.
i am married with 2 children.
My family is always on the move, and we love to explore new places together.
i graduated college a few years ago.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.
i have a severe phobia of wide open spaces.
i hate that my mom made me get braces.
I love growing plants in my greenhouse, but I have to be careful about what I grow because of my asthma.
I now have a new most valuable possession - my library card.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook and grow plants in my greenhouse.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making homemade pasta. It's a lot of work, but it's so worth it.
Homemade pasta sounds delicious! I've never tried making it before.
You should! It's not as hard as it sounds.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime. What kind of plants do you grow in your greenhouse?
I grow a variety of plants, including tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, and herbs.
That sounds amazing! I wish I had a greenhouse.
It's really great. I love being able to grow my own food.
Me too. I'm trying to grow some tomatoes in my backyard this year.
That's great! I hope they turn out well.
